title: Check us out! We offer washers and dryers in all of our apartments!
posting_body: ['Embarcadero Club', '2210 Sullivan Road', 'College Park, GA 30337', 'show contact info', 'Unit Information:', '2 Bedroom | 2 Bath', 'Unit Size:', '865 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1453', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Unit Includes:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Balcony', '● Carpet', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Deck', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Window Coverings', '● Cable Ready', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Microwave', '● Views', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer/Dryer Hookup', '● Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'Property Description:', 'Embarcadero Club Apartments boasts Amenities that make living here both comfortable and convenient.', 'Work out in our fitness center or simply relax by the pool.', 'We offer a spacious sunning deck perfect for grilling or picnicking.', 'You can also play a game of tennis on one of our two tennis courts, or update your social media status in our business center.', '2 BD 2 BA 865 SQ FT', 'Property Amenities:', '● 24/7 Emergency Maintenance', '● BBQ/Picnic Area', '● Business Center', '● Courtyard', '● Fitness Center', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Maintenance on site', '● Parking', '● Picnic Area', '● Sparkling Pool', '● Clubhouse with Huge Meeting Room', '● Convenient to I-285', '● Courtesy Patrol', '● Less Than 5 Minutes To Hartfield-Jackson', '● Lighted Tennis Courts', '● Mature Landscaping', '● Package Service', '● Pet Care', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Relaxing Saunas', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Call us today!', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pet Ownership Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'No aggressive breeds.', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '435CE2CF74B3421']
